issue.title: [CI] Upgrade xcode version for testing homebrew formulae
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8569](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8569). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
To prevent as many bottles from being built from source.

comments.body:
